short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes 'http://' and 'https://' strings from X (Twitter) bio when editing profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly clean up your X (formerly Twitter) profile by automatically removing all "http://" strings while editing. Simplify your bio and links with just one click. Easy to use and seamless integration.
